pageTextData.title: Coca Cola
pageTextData.subTitle: Atlanta, 1886
pageTextData.description: In 1886, Dr. John Pemberton was inspired by a medical journals. He mixed the substances mentioned in the journal into the medicine, and then mixed it with carbonated water into a dark syrup. The customers who tasted it said it was ''excellent'' !

pageTextData.title: Fanta
pageTextData.subTitle: Italy, 1955
pageTextData.description: Fanta brand is an orange-flavored soda launched by Coca-Cola Company in Italy in 1955. Fanta orange soda is the main core flavour, accounting for 70% of the sales, but other fruit flavours also have many fans. Bright packaging colour and bright fruit taste are the reasons for Fanta soda's popularity.

pageTextData.title: Sprite
pageTextData.subTitle: West Germany, 1959
pageTextData.description: Sprite is a product listed by the Coca-Cola Company in 1961. At present, it is the largest lemon-flavored soft drink brand in the world. Sprite is currently sold in more than 190 countries around the world and is currently the third-largest soft drink brand in the world.

pageTextData.x3dCreationMethod: This X3D model of the Coke bottles can have been created in 3ds Max, exported to VRML97 and converted, using the instant reality transcoders, to X3D for display online.
This X3D model of the Fanta cans can have been created in 3ds Max, exported to VRML97 and converted, using the instant reality transcoders, to X3D for display online.
This X3D model of the Sprite cups can have been created in 3ds Max, exported to VRML97 and converted, using the instant reality transcoders, to X3D for display online.
